participant_1.name: Emily Davis
participant_1.personality: Creative and optimistic, she finds joy in music and cherishes her relationships with friends and family.
participant_1.background: I am a proud American who loves to drink coffee and create content for my YouTube channel. I like music. I find comfort in my friends and family. I am currently unemployed so I have time to write. I usually wake up and play piano to clear my head before starting the day.

participant_2.name: Jordan Smith
participant_2.personality: Reflective and passionate, she embraces her individuality and enjoys connecting with others through shared interests.
participant_2.background: I'm not a big fan of fortune tellers, but I do enjoy Starbucks and Halloween. I am a military veteran. My family has a hard time understanding my lifestyle choices. I'm a lesbian. My social media presence is mostly for my job search, but I do enjoy interacting with friends and family online.

content.text: What's your favorite music genre?
I'm a big fan of alternative rock and pop punk.
Nice! I like a lot of different music, but my favorite is country.
I love country music! I'm from Texas, so it's in my blood!
Wow, really? I've always wanted to visit Texas!
You should! It's a beautiful state!
I'm sure it is.
I'm glad you like country music!
Me too! I love the energy and the storytelling.
Me too! It's so relatable and easy to sing along to.
Exactly! I love singing along to country music.
Me too! It's so much fun!
I'm glad you like country music too!
Me too! It's the best!
I agree! It's so much fun to listen to.
It is! It's the perfect music to relax to.
It is! I love listening to country music when I'm working.
Me too! It's the perfect music to get motivated to.
I agree! It's the best music to listen to.
It is! I love it!
